offset-top.description: The distance from the top when the ceiling is raised, in rpx
offset-top.description_zh: 吸顶时与顶部的距离，单位rpx

index.description: A custom identity to distinguish which component it is
index.description_zh: 自定义标识，用于区分是哪一个组件

enable.description: Whether to turn on the ceiling function

z-index.description: The value of the z-index at the time of ceiling lifting

h5-nav-height.description: When customizing the navigation bar (set to 0 if there is no navigation bar), you need to pass this value in px
h5-nav-height.description_zh: 导航栏高度，自定义导航栏时(无导航栏时需设置为0)，需要传入此值，单位px

events.name: fixed
events.description: Triggered when the component is raised

events.name: unfixed
events.description: Triggered when the component cancels the ceiling
